Description:
SNC-Lavalin has been established in the Gulf for over 40 years, having first carried out design and supervision commissions in the Gulf area in 1967. We provide a full range of design, engineering and project management services for buildings, transportation and other infrastructure programmes.Faithful + Gould in the Middle East now employs around 2,000 staff serving Gulf clients across all market sectors from offices in Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Doha, Dubai, Jeddah, Kuwait City, Manama, Muscat, Riyadh, Sharjah.We now seek to recruit a Documents Controller Specialist to effectively and consistently managing the documents and electronic business records related to the project.Requirements:Fluent in Arabic and English
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Aconex
Time-management skills
Ability to pay attention to detail
Organization skills
Interpersonal skills
5 years experience, 3 years in Middle East mega projects
Preferably experience using PMIS - Primavera Unifier
Saudi national 
Based in Medina, Saudi ArabiaJob Details
